sections.heading: V school district; board of education; vice president; duties
sections.text: The vice president of the board of education of a Class V school district shall perform all the duties of the president in case of the president's absence or disability.SourceLaws 1891, c. 45, § 10, p. 320;R.S.1913, § 7018;C.S.1922, § 664

79-593.Class V school district; board of education; vice president; duties.

The vice president of the board of education of a Class V school district shall perform all the duties of the president in case of the president's absence or disability.

SourceLaws 1891, c. 45, § 10, p. 320;R.S.1913, § 7018;C.S.1922, § 6649;C.S.1929, § 79-2712;R.S.1943, § 79-2713;Laws 1949, c. 256, § 258, p. 778;R.S.1943, (1994), § 79-1004.02;Laws 1996, LB 900, § 346.
